entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Westlock
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
